title: Can't update through patch 6.17
body:
Every time I try to patch the game it give me and error "Unspecified error has occurred" it happens every time at exactly 33% after about 150 files scanned. Its been doing the same thing for the past 3 days. 

I've disabled and uninstalled my anti-virus, tried to disable my firewall and patch, and deleted my lol_game_client_sln file. 

None of these have worked, I've restarted my computer and tried updating again, it gets a bit farther (to around 800 files scanned still at 33%) and then it gives me the same "unspecified error has occurred"
I've looked everywhere for a fix and nothing is working, please for the love of god give me something to work with

replies.body:
Issues at 33% and beyond are largely caused by a poor connection to the patching service. There may be additional network configurations local to your PC that are still causing this, so I suggest checking out the rest of the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this issue persists.
